test file content

content='```html

File Upload and Processing

Users, like avril, can upload files in either .pdf or .txt formats directly through the interface.

Document Parsing and Chunking

Uploaded documents are parsed using either PyPDFLoader (for .pdf files) or UnstructuredFileLoader. The resulting content is then split into smaller chunks using RecursiveCharacterTextSplitter.
